title: [Placements]  ‚ÄúIBM 17 LPA annual remuneration offer ‚Äì what‚Äôs the actual in-hand salary?‚Äù
content:
Hey everyone,  
IBM has come for campus placements this year and mentioned the following package:

* **Compensation (Regular):** B.E/ B.Tech / M.E/ M.Tech / M.Sc / Integrated (B.Tech+M.Tech) / Dual (B.Tech+M.Tech) / MCA ‚Üí **INR 17 Lakh Annual Remuneration + 1.5 Lakh one-time Premium Component + 25,000 one-time Settling In Allowance**

I wanted to check with seniors who are already placed in IBM (through campus) or currently working there:

* How much of this 17 LPA is the **actual in-hand monthly salary**?
* Does IBM have a big variable component, or is most of it fixed?
* How are the one-time components (1.5L premium + 25k settling-in) paid‚Äîimmediately after joining or later?
* Any deductions (PF, gratuity, taxes) I should be aware of that bring down the take-home?

Basically, I just want to understand the **realistic take-home per month** after all deductions.

Would really appreciate any insights from seniors who are placed in IBM previous year, or anyone who knows these details üôè

comments.body:
17 lakh is the actual base no variable component .Out of this 1.2 lakh goes towards pf and gratuity , so 15.8 is take home before taxes .After taxes and pf you get 1.24 Lakhs per month.on top of that the joining bonus is 1.75 lakhs paid after 1 month of full time .

for internship you get 35 k relocation allowance if not from Bangalore .

On top of this if the department you are in does good you get some bonus
Thank you so much for the details!
Do you have any prior internship experience?
How many of the IDM hires last year were non CS?
For applying 7CGPA was the cutoff, they may reconsider and increase it while shortlisting for interviews
Also can we sit for the interview even if we are not from cs branch or don't have a cs minor degree?
How tf do I secure an internship, on campus all the cheaters are shortlisted off campus I don't have a strong resume
How many days does it take to get the results?
